body:
This pr replaces #6880 
"""
A pull request for FastSimulation iterative tracking clean-up. This request includes the removal of FastTrackMerger, creation of SimTrackIdProducer, removal of unnecessary code due to the repetition of same functionalities in multiple places. The previously appearing PluginLibraryLoadError has been fixed.
"""
title: Fast sim tracking clean up 2
